name: Finlandia Oaks Lily
preparation:
The refreshing mix of vodka, sweet-and-sour mix, triple sec and cranberry juice is perfect for an outdoor occasion on a spring day. No wonder it’s the official vodka cocktail of the Kentucky Derby.

Add all ingredients into a mixing glass with ice and stir until well-chilled.

Strain into a rocks glass over fresh ice.

Garnish with a speared blackberry and lemon twist.
